item.description:
Learn about the 9 types, which type you are, how to develop in your type and how to relate effectively to all 9 types. Herb acts out the types with hats.

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. Counseling, has taught over 2000 Enneagram workshops in the last 23 years. He is the author of Enneagram Basics, Enneagram Beyond the Basics, and Herb's Tips for Living. He uses the Enneagram extensively for his counseling with individuals, couples and families.

http://www.herbpearce.com

To find out about upcoming workshops in June go to my Personality Types meetup or go to my website. There's a Type 4, Type 8 and Type 9 workshop, an Advanced Enneagram workshop and an Enneagram Movie Night.

Â
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Enneagram Personality Types Workshop
